Nemesis Enforcer:




Nemesis Enforcer was now in a CR chamber.  But he had another dream.  

Everything was black, until the great Autobot hero, Optimus Prime, came in 
front of him.  "Nemesis Enforcer...the Matrix must speak with you!"

"I thought the Matrix was called: "The Autobot Matrix of Leadership" and it 
held all the knowledge and such of Autobot leaders, not storing every life 
force of the Cybertronians?"

"Errr...well...oh...ummm...let's see..." Optimus said, putting a hand against 
his chin.  "The Matrix will answer your questions!" Optimus disappeared, a 
view of Cybertron far above.  The view closed in, going through underground 
sectors.  Finally, Nemesis ended up in a dark underground "cavern".  

It was indeed a strange place, only a grand staircase visible, carpeted in 
red and purple.  He looked ahead.  He had heard osmething like a loud, 
booming voice, only it wasn't like a yell.  It wasn't even a voice 
really...it just seemed to come into his head.  Nemesis pondered.  Was this 
the Matrix, which had been a rumor?  Or just one of those random voices that 
came up every few blows to the head?

-=YOU ARE NOW INTERFACING WITH THE ORACLE, WHERE THE SPARKS OF ALL WHO LIVED, 
OR ARE GOING TO LIVE MEET.  WELCOMES VULOIS=-   

"Wait, I thought you, the Matrix, held all people's 'sparks?' " Nemesis 
asked, confused.

-=JUST SHUT THE SLAG UP!  I'M NOT PERFECT=-

"Sorry..." Nemesis, beginning to lose.


-=Let The Oracle explain. What you saw before, in your last moments of 
consciousness had a purple. You were not sent to Past Earth as 
punishment, but for a reason. We want you to be our abassador. We 
want all of Cybertronians interested in making Cybertron organice, dead!  You 
must unite all the factions, and crush Vulois and the others!  Cybertron has 
a tron on the end for a reason!  Unite, and bring the organic lovers to their 
knees!  Forming a new peace.  We want one faction, living inorganically. You 
and two others are too start our peace group. You must build a bomb on 
neutral ground, and hold meetings 
to "return to Cybertron under one organic faction that all 
Cybertronians will become". The four that you should kill with the bomb are 
Soundwave, Battera, Vulois, and Cybershark. They might not die, but you 
must slaughter them.=-

"What about that bastard Serpentor?  Will he die?"

-=He has not finished outliving his usefulness.  He, and Scattershot will be 
the ones to start the Third Golden Age of Cybertron=-

"Then I will do it!  Bloodshed...yeess...send me back to the past date I was 
in on that dirtball called Earth!"

Nemesis felt like he was going at a super fast speed, until covered him, 
Nemesis disappearing.  

When he regained sight, he was back on Earth, in the past, in a big dark box 
it seemed.

"This must be where I'll build the bomb!  Then I'll kick organic loving skid 
plates!"
